data.name: Ambush
data.detailed_description:
Disclaimer: Ambush is not a single player game, 2 players minimum required, up to 8 players.
This game can be played remotely using Steam Remote Play.

Disclaimer: Only one player can play with a keyboard. Other players will need a controller, even if you are using Steam Remote Play.


Ambush is a party game up to 2-8 local players. Stay hidden in a crowd, spot players among the bots, and slice them up with your freshly sharpened katana.
Strategy and violence will be part of the game.

Up to 8 local players


Do you dream of cutting up your friends? Invite them for a game up to 8 local players and learn them how to use a katana.

Remote Play


Thanks to the Steam Remote Play Together feature, play with your friends by sharing your screen, only one version of the game is required among the 8 players!
There is also Parsec software, an alternative to Steam Remote Play Together.

Steam Remote Play Together: https://store.steampowered.com/remoteplay

Game modes


Each game mode is based on the concept of being concealed among a crowd of AI (Artificial Intelligence).

Ninja mode
Players are partially revealed every 10 seconds. You will need to be mobile, discreet and opportunistic!

Lasers mode
Lasers pass through the area, forcing you to make a choice : Stay hidden or run to avoid laser amputation.

Items mode
Items appear in the arena, get them and overtake your opponents. Detect them, cut them out, electrocute them, anything goes!

Digital zone mode
A deadly area is closing, the tension will increase crescendo!

Stars mode
Stars are dropped in the arena, collect them all, or kill your opponents for victory!

data.short_description: Ambush is a party game up to 2-8 local players. Stay hidden in a crowd, spot other players among the bots, and slice them up with your freshly sharpened katana. Strategy and violence will be part of the game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 Fury
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Pad controllers required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / or Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Pad controllers required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

movies.name: Ambush - How to be a good assassin

content_descriptors.notes: Warning : this game contains katana fights with blood and dismemberments.
